content.description: Crimpy face moves with some intermittent cracks, to a large ledge, to another short face of thin face climbing.
content.protection: 6 bolts to chains. Chains shared with Jameson AND Darling Nikki.
content.location: Starts right where the large belay ledge meets the hillside.

content.description: Interesting direct start to jugs the whole way.  Bring an apline draw or sling to to clip the upper bolt of Hemingway.
content.protection: 6 bolts to chains.  Shared anchors with Hemigway.

content.description:
Pretty fun, albeit typical for the area crimpy, balancey route. Some technical crimpy sidepulls through here, with challenging feet.

Descent:

Rappel route.
content.location: Atop the small rise almost all the way right on the large ledge

content.description:
The rock on the lower part of this route is different than the typical slabby grey limestone characteristic of the area. Pretty forgettable moves, but worth doing if it's your grade and you are right there.

Descent:

Rappel route.
content.location: Just left of the small rise near the far right end of the large ledge.

content.description: Thin face climbing to a thought provoking blank section 3 bolts up.
content.protection: 3 bolts to chains.  Shares chains with Dirty Dianna.

content.description: Variation start to Darling Nikki or Willbilly. Climb the thin face through some fun crimps and cracks to a large ledge.
content.protection: 6 bolts to chains. Chains shared with Willbilly AND Darling Nikki.
content.location: Just left of a belay bolt at shin level.

content.description: Climb up to the undercling venturing out onto the face at the first bolt.  Delicate moves through the second and third bolts lead you to the top. See photo of Dad.
content.protection: 5 bolts to chains.  Shares anchors with Dad.
content.location: 6th route from the left.  Up the middle of the triangle-shaped piece of rock in the middle of the wall.

content.protection: 7 bolts to chains. Shares anchors with Stephen King.

content.description: Climb the rail or climb the face for full value.
content.protection: 3 bolts to chains. Shares anchors with Kocaine Karolina.

content.description:
Crux seemed to be down low, and a bit awkward. Clipping the first bolt can be a tad sketchy, as the footholds you stand on at first are very, very loose.

Use caution in the belay area/first half of this climb. Lots of loose rock.

Descent:

Rappel route.
content.location: Walk as far climbers right along the large ledge as you can. Route starts to the right of a hefty tree, above a waist high belay bolt (use it).

content.description: Climb the face/notch to the large ledge, then up over some bulges (crux) to the chains.
content.protection: 6 bolts to chains. Chains shared with Jameson AND Willbilly.
content.location: Directly above the first shin level belay bolt you find.

content.description: Climb jugs for the first few bolts, then layback the crack or get out on the face for for value.
content.protection: 4 bolts to chains.  Shares anchors with Howard.
